title: Energy: new sources. - 2nd ed.
creator_credit: Churchill Films, Robert Churchill and Thomas Smith
brief_description: Looks at potential alternatives to our present dependence on fossil fuels, such as solar energy, nuclear fusion, geothermal and synthetic fuels. The future of the world’s energy supplies is cast in an optimistic light.
